Embeddings

Embeddings#

tensorkrowch.unit(data, size)[source]#

Embedds the data tensor using the local feature map defined in the original paper by E. Miles Stoudenmire and David J. Schwab.

Parameters

  • data (torch.Tensor) –

    Data tensor with shape

    \[n_{features} \times batch\_size \times feature\_size\]

    where \(feature\_size = 1\).

  • size (int) – New feature size.

Returns

New data tensor with shape

\[n_{features} \times batch\_size \times size\]

Return type

torch.Tensor

tensorkrowch.add_ones(data, dim=- 1)[source]#

Embedds the data tensor adding 1’s as the first component of each vector.

\[\begin{split}\hat{x}_i = \begin{bmatrix} 1 \\ x_i \end{bmatrix}\end{split}\]
Parameters

  • data (torch.Tensor) –

    Data tensor with shape

    \[n_{features} \times batch\_size\]

  • dim (int) – New dimension (axis) to insert. Should be between 0 and the rank of data.

Returns

New data tensor with shape

\[n_{features} \times batch\_size \times 2\]

Return type

torch.Tensor
